title: Home
content: Adrian Miller Media. Professional video editing, audio production, and media services for Salt Lake area. Creating high-quality media without the agency price tag.

title: About
content: About Adrian Miller. Professional audio and video producer with degrees in Music Recording Technology and Digital Audio. Experience in theatre recording, podcast production, video editing, and live sound.

title: Contact
content: Contact Adrian Miller Media. Get in touch for your next project. Email adrianmillermedia@gmail.com

title: Theatre Production Rates
content: Theatre production recording rates. Multi-camera recording packages for musical theatre productions. Standard and junior pricing options with flat rate or per-copy pricing.

title: Concert and Ensemble Recording Rates
content: Concert and ensemble recording rates. Professional recording packages for choir concerts, band performances, and orchestra concerts. Standard and junior pricing tiers.

title: Dance Concert Rates
content: Dance concert recording rates. Professional multi-camera recording for dance recitals and performances. Two-tier pricing for single and multi-performance events.

title: Family History Rates
content: Family legacy interview rates. Preserve your family history with professional video portraits. Archival raw sessions and edited heirloom packages available.

title: Audio Work
content: Audio production portfolio. Music composition, podcast editing, audio mixing, and mastering services. Listen to samples of original compositions and professionally mixed projects.

title: Video Work
content: Video production portfolio. Music videos, promotional content, ad campaigns, instructional videos, and corporate video editing. Professional editing and motion graphics.

title: Theatre Showreel
content: Theatre production showreel. Multi-camera recording and professional audio production for live theatre. View samples of theatre production recordings.

title: Project Archive
content: Project archive. Additional works and extended portfolio collections including theatre recordings, musical recordings, podcasts, and video projects.

title: James Family Legacy
content: James Family Legacy project. Preserving the history, stories, and memories of Robert and Linda James through professional video documentation.

title: Project Request
content: Submit a project request. Get a custom quote for your audio or video production project. Contact form for theatre, concert, family history, or custom media projects.
